long_description: The Clarks Ruckus Maker boots feature rugged looks and all-day comfort for versatile wear. Tough, lasting nubuck leather uppers offer excellent weather and stain resistance; nylon panels enhance flexibility and breathability. Resilient polyester felt linings wick moisture away from feet. Washable OrthoLite(R) foam insoles enhance comfort. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Nylon shanks supply stability and support on uneven terrain. Rubber outsoles on the Clarks Ruckus Maker boots offer everyday traction.
short_description: The Clarks Ruckus Maker boots feature rugged looks and all-day comfort for versatile wear.
